TEXT.TITLE: WTD INDUSTRIES <WTDI> SAWMILL OFFER REJECTED
TEXT.BODY: WTD Industries Inc said its offer to buy the bankrupt Harris Pine sawmill in Pendleton, Oregon was rejected by the bankruptcy court trustee. The company said the bid was rjected in favor of a higher offer. Reuter
